p: The stems (102.5 g), leaves (84.0 g), and flowers (82.0 g) of P.aucheri and also stems (110 g), leaves (80 g), and roots (65 g) of T. polium were separately subjected to hydrodistillation using a Clevenger-type apparatus for 3 h. After decanting and drying of the oils over anhydrous sodium sulfate the corresponding yellowish coloured oils were recovered [in the yield of 0.2%, 0.4%, 0.3%, 0.2%, 0.4% and 0.1% (w/w), respectively].
